name: Raju
desc: A few interesting things about me. I love to read science fiction (my favorite is Frank Herbert's Dune). I am also an avid gamer. I love to play competitive strategy games and first-person shooters. Lastly, I love learning. Every day I push myself to learn something new, whether that be about machine learning, software engineering, or miscellaneous facts about the universe.

experience.job desc: I was in the Team Responsible for creating an internal dashboard tool.It is now used to measure user engagement metrics such as the number of active users and the summary of their activities on the website we worked on.My responsiblities included planning,initial research and project management.

Worked with Data Scientists and Product Manager to frame a problem,both mathematically  and within the business context.Also worked on deploying validated algorithms in our RTB system, and develop techniques for monitoring and visualising performance of all deployed algorithms.

experience.job: Web Scraping, Data Visualisation and Regression Modelling
experience.job desc: Compiled pricing data for competitive analysis by performing webscraping in python. Supervised model development,testing and validation of 100+ financial products and services.Created Charts in jupyter notebook to perform preliminary analysis and visualize data using Matplotlib.

projects.project desc: This Quiz application was a mini-project created using JAVA which had questions related to semester subjects.It had both student and teachers login so that student can learn and teachers can view their performance.

This was also an mini-project created using python libraries like beautifulsoup,requests,etc. The task was to scrape all the data realted to previuos prime minister of india and display the data in a GUI.

projects.project title: Build a dummy Blockchain in Python
projects.project desc: This was a project created by me at the end of the Blockchain course by using Python.It was a blockchain with dummy cryptocurrency called 'hadcoins. I learned the basics and requirements of a blockchain through the project

education.info-1: My IT Engineering started from year 2017 by cracking CET and got accepted in Pillai's College         of Engineering. I have experienced lots of things in this college, from great learning to             particapting in sports festival and college committees. I have participated in events like            Treasure Hunt, Job Fair,etc. My Academic Progress throughout this years is as follow:

I have completed my Junior College from Birla Junior College, Kalyan with Bifocal                     subject as Informatics Practices.I started my programming journey through this subject,JAVA           was the first language I came across Cleared my HSC and it helped me in choosing my career in         prgramming
education.info-2: I cleared my HSC by scoring 83.14 % and appeared from CET and JEE Mains.
